name: Bugology
description:
Bugology is a educational hide & find game for ages 3 and up. Bugology offers several exciting features for users such as:

  • Universal Storage - all of your progress is stored on our servers, so no matter what device you're using you can easily switch between your tablet, Mac, Pc or any other device and never lose your games progress.
  • Custom Wallpapers - you can unlock/purchase custom wallpapers for your main menu in game from the options menu.
  • Custom Mouse Cursors - you can unlock/purchase custom mouse pointers in game.
  • Multiple Environments - all insects live in different environments around the world. You can unlock/purchase all 5 and unlock and find all the bugs in game.
  • 40 Insects - Bugology has 40 different insects to find & collect. Everytime you find a new bug, you can learn fun facts about the insect by opening your bug book.
  • Achievements System - you can earn WBG coins to unlock new environments, unlock custom wallpapers, unlock custom mouse pointers or spend your coins in one of our other products. WBG coins are universal WBG currency!
